text: I had to do this a while ago, obviously you can’t do this in a module, though i wish you could:
It would be great if in a module choice field in the set variables section you can use hubl to set a custom list of variables

Feature request: Products type selector in field groups - Just like the blog selector in the custom module development, if we have product selector, so anyone can select the product, he want to add on his page or in email.
The option to sort HubDB tables alphabetically (maybe by other columns too) would be excellent.

a GUI for this on the hubdb table would be cool for sure. in case you didn't know though, it is currently possible in hubl with a filter: <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/hubl/hubl-supported-filters#sort>
Thanks Stefen, GUI is what I meant :slightly_smiling_face:

Idea - Similar to the resize_image_url function I’d like a `video_format_url` function.

Scenario - background video  in custom module,  I have a file input field. user picks mp4 video. I want to also have a .webm file in my source for the video element. or vice versa, they upload a .webm I want to have .mp4 source as well.
right now this requires manually converting the video to the other video format, and uploading it too, this means multiple file input fields
